= Installation =

== Install Arduino ==
First you need to be able to connect your Arduino to your computer. Follow the instructions on the Arduino site for the [http://arduino.cc/en/Guide/HomePage installation]. You can use the [http://arduino.cc/en/Tutorial/Blink Blink example] which comes with Arduino to test it out. 

== Download the Code ==
The source code is hosted on this svn repository: https://ci-lamp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/. Read [http://code.google.com/p/ci-lamp/source/checkout this] for more information on how to check out the code

== Load the Arduino Program ==
Upload the program under arduino\source\ci_lamp\ci_lamp.pde to your Arduino board. The easiest way is to open it using the Arduino IDE and upload it from there.
